resources.string: A book is a collection of printed or blank pages fastened together inside a cover, used for reading or writing. It can also be a written work published in electronic or printed form.
A computer is a programmable electronic device that accepts data as input, processes it using a central processing unit (CPU), and produces output, often storing the information for later use.

A college is an institution of higher education that provides post-secondary education, typically granting associate or bachelor\'s degrees. It can also refer to a specialized training school or a constituent part of a larger university.
Software is a collection of instructions, data, and programs that direct a computer or other electronic device to perform specific tasks
